document.discussion_title: SC stays top militant’s bail for 3 months
document.topic_text: SC stays top militant’s bail for 3 months Published : Monday, 22 August, 2016 at 1:46 PM , Count : 0 jamuna news: The Supreme Court today stayed the High Court order for three months that had granted bail to Fida Muntaseer Shaker, an alleged coordinator of banned militant outfit Ansarullah Bangla Team (ABT) in two cases.The five member bench of the Appellate Division headed by Chief Justice Surendra Kumar Sinha today passed the order following a petition filed by the government seeking a stay on the HC order.Before, the HC on June 16 this year granted six months’ bail to Shaker following two petitions filed by him.Detectives arrested Shaker in the capitals Banani DOHS area on June 7, 2015.jamunanews24.com/na/aug-22-2016
